solution_line_template: If there were 4000 whales in the sea three years ago, and their number doubled this year, then there are {double_factor}*{whales_last_year} = <<{whales_last_year}*{double_factor}={whales_this_year}>>{whales_this_year} whales in the sea this year.
If the predictions come true, there will be {whales_this_year}+{predicted_increase} = <<{whales_this_year}+{predicted_increase}={whales_next_year}>>{whales_next_year} whales in the water next year.
